name: Digital Signature For Gravity Forms
author: howdytheme

sections.description:
Gravity Forms Digital Signature is free plugin. Downloading the Gravity Form with the Digital Signature Field is free here. We build too easy to access and use for users can sign your gravity form. In emails, the email content itself becomes part of the digital signature.

A digital signature, where the prerequisites are satisfied, gives a recipient very high confidence that the message was created by a known sender.

FEATURES FOR DIGITAL SIGNATURE FOR GRAVITY FORMS:

  • Easy to use
  • Set signature pad width and height
  • Clear signature button
  • Mobile friendly
  • Change signature pad background and pen color
  • Set signature pen width
  • Customize signature clear button text
  • Set field required
  • Set custom validation message.
  • Draw or clear the signature pad
  • Show attachment in entries
  • Signature title, notice

Documentation
Live Demo
Get Premium

FEATURES FOR DIGITAL SIGNATURE FOR GRAVITY FORMS PREMIUM:

  • Add multiple signature pads in your form
